article:
We all know that sports may help us become stronger. But their  _  go far beyond this. Research shows that sports that   _  aiming and hitting skills, for example, tennis, badminton and baseball, help children increase   _  . They help develop leadership qualities and  _  team spirit in kids. They involve competition. Playing sports teaches them to accept   _   with a positive spirit when they lose a game.
Playing sports does a lot of good to the development of   _  skills. Sports teach you to communicate with people and work together as a   _  . Sports improve collective thinking and help develop your planning and organizational skills, too. Sports build   _  , since winning a game always gives you a sense of accomplishment.
Playing sports requires you to strategize  . You need to be very   _  to score goals or earn points. You need to  work out   strategies to win. You need to judge your competitor's strategy and revise yours  _  . This certainly involves clever thinking, which sports   _  . Studies show that kids who play sports   _  do well in school and college.
Playing sports brings you   _  . Jumping about, running around, racing to get ahead,   _  , falling and standing up again, all of them are a(n)   _   of playing sports. There is no   _  to the happiness this brings.   In other words  , sports are a form of exercise which produces happiness molecules   in your body, thus improving your mental health. You can't be sad  _   playing sports. Sports produce   _  energy in you and the people around you.
